forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun. High 18C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 66F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy this evening with more clouds for overnight. Low 11C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low 52F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 21C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High near 70F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear evening skies will give way to mostly cloudy skies overnight. Low 11C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear evening skies will give way to mostly cloudy skies overnight. Low 52F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 18C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. High 64F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies and rain later during the night. Low 11C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening then becoming cloudy with periods of rain after midnight. Low 52F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 16C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall may reach 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 62F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall possibly over one inch.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low around 10C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 51F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Some light rain is likely. High 17C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 63F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 49F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday

forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 66F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low 52F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 18C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 64F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 54F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 66F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies early then becoming mostly cloudy later at night. Low 52F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High around 65F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Low 54F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.
